item.description:
It's official, we'll be meeting at Maple Farm Sanctuary in Mendon which is only a short ride from Worcester! We'll be meeting there at 11am to do some work around the farm. Then it's a potluck lunch! If you need a ride please let me know and we can organize carpooling.

For more info on the sanctuary please visit: http://www.maplefarms...


If you have any questions you can reach me at 508-410-3172.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess ;)
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp August Meetup
